attributes.action: stop giving himself and the mps 10% pay rises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nurses and police have thier wages frozen while MP's get a 10% pay rise!!!!! 
Think about paying police, nurses, firefighters and ordinary more money, also that rich people should be made to pay more tax then those on a lower wage. Rich people should be made to put more back into society!

rejection.details:
Please use a full name.

There are similar petitions already live:

MPs pay: 	http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPrenumeration/
